name: DRIFT: Chased by Police
description:
Drift Chased by police escape and collide the police cars with each other a Police car chase game which you can run your car to Escape the police chase and Drift the car to avoid the obstacles and make the police cars to collide with each other and blow them up the cop cars will follow you escape them in the map and make them collide with the Obstacles and destroy them and Beat your Best score Collect cash to Buy new cars with more Speed and power 

How To Play

there are three type of Game play controller you can Choose

1. Steering : steer the wheel left and right to move the car

2. Gyroscope : Rotate your phone left or right to move the car

3. Tap : Tap the left or right screen of phone to move the car to the desired location

Drift Through the Best looking forest style Environment

FEATURES

  • 3 Controllers
  • 11 Car Unlockable vehicle
  •  Collect Cash
  •  Collect repair
  • Open world style
  •  Buy cars
  •  All vehicle are different in style , speed and performance
  •  Change the color of your cars

Have Fun playing the game more cars and more map of Environments will be Added
